price: (Rasûlüm!) Sağırlara sen mi işittireceksin; yahut körleri ve apaçık sapıklıkta olanları doğru yola sen mi ileteceksin?
arabic: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma aw tahdī al-ʿum'ya waman kāna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
